price: ߊ߬ ߕߎ߲߬ ߓߊ߯ ߒ߬ ߘߌߦߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߘߴߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ( ߞߐ߰ߡߊ߫ ) ߛߞߊߞߊ ߘߌ߫ ، ߥߟߊߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߴߏ߬ ( ߞߍߓߊߟߌߦߊ ) ߞߏߢߌ߲ߡߊߟߐ߲ ߞߍ߫
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
